text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the MSI GE Series GE63 8RF-099CA Raider RGB 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE Series GE63 8RF-099CA Raider RGB 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE Series GE63 8RF-099CA Raider RGB 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!
